attributes.additional_details:
For  anyone travelling on buses outside London in my case the West Midlands have to deal with a sub-standard service as the bus companies have a virtual monopoly and they are more interested in profits rather than giving good service.

I would ask you to sign this petition so that the deregulation bill for buses that operates only in London is rolled out to all large urban areas so that we can all get the bus services we desrve,
